mapper.select: SELECT d.id as id, m.name as agencyName, m.agency_profile_url as agencyProfile, d.project_id as projectId, dp.name as projectName, dp.description as projectDescription, d.user_id as userId, d.amount as amount, d.is_boast as isBoast FROM donation d LEFT JOIN donate_project dp ON d.project_id = dp.id LEFT JOIN membership m ON dp.agency_id = m.id WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO donation (project_id, user_id, amount) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{userId}, #{amount})

INSERT INTO donate_project (agency_id, name, description, target_donation_amount, start_time, end_time) VALUES (#{agencyId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{targetDonationAmount}, #{startTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM affiliated WHERE donated_user_id = #{userId}
